## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G32980](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G32980)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AUG2</u>
- **Gene Name:** augmin subunit 2
- **Description:**   HAUS augmin-like complex subunit;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2059390
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
